dialogue: Suh-weet! I feel better than Daenerys Targaryen on prom night!
What? Daenerys never went to prom...
Oh, sure, if you only follow the show's canon.
She went to prom in the books?
In the expanded fan-canon, yeah. Specifically, the fan-fiction I wrote. About taking Daenerys to prom. And before you ask: yes, I was crowned Prom Khal.
So...will you fix the coffee machine for me now?
